about_the_game:
A traveler from a different world accidentally lands in a magical world. This is a dangerous and terrifying world, please choose the appropriate weapons and props, survive, and wait for rescue.

Our game features:

Multiple difficulty options (simple, ordinary, epic)

Multiple unique weapon options (laser, particle, explosion)

Hundreds of different quality props (energy stones, consumables)

Diverse and growable monsters (ordinary, elite, boss)

Our gameplay

Choosing the difficulty level of the current world will affect the attribute changes of monsters. Eliminating monsters can gain energy and experience. At the same time, when entering the world, a unique weapon will be selected, which will follow the entire game. With each wave of monster tide passing, the upgrade store will be opened. Please continuously upgrade your weapons or choose suitable props to improve yourself. Persist and complete this challenge.

name: XenoAdventure
short_description: Xenoadventure is a shooting light adventure game from a top-down perspective, where players will operate a novice warrior in the game. Based on one's own talents, continuously improve oneself from the system and survive
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Turkish, Japanese, Polish, Simplified Chinese, Portuguese - Portugal, Korean
